defs: a quantity adopted as a basis or standard of measurement in terms of which other quantities may be expressed; a unit.
(math.) the system of units.
flowing, moving, looking in one direction only.
ex-parte - a) on, from or in the interest of, one side or party only; b) from a one-sided or partisan point view.
involving or obligating one only of several persons or parties; done or undertaken by one only; not reciprocal; unilateral.

ಏಕಮುಖವಾಗಿರು ēkamukhavāgiru to move in one direction, one object or destination only; 2. to concentrate the mind on one object only; 3. (a competition, trial, etc. planned or designed) to be advantageous to only one of the two rival persons; to be biased.
